name: Idle Ball Islands
description:
Idle Ball Islands - The idle ball physics game!

Physics Fun + Zen Relaxation

Help your balls reach the end of each island with lots of upgrades and unlocks. Multiple islands to explore, bosses to overcome, and much more!


Whether you're looking for a zen idle experience to relax after a long day or a more active ball physics game we have what you're looking for.

Our "Relaxation" island is a chill out zone with no major threats that you have to deal with. Enjoy the relaxing music, colors, and stages that are oddly satisfying to stare at.

Overcome physics obstacles through upgrading each stage and work through countless islands all with unique puzzles, enemies, and challenges.

Unlock 8 ball types and spawn random special ball power ups across tons of varied levels.

Bottom line, if you're looking for a ball physics game with both zen style relaxation and more crazy action we have it! Enjoy an idle, and not-so-idle game experience all in one game.

THE FUN NEVER ENDS! ;)

If you're willing to test the game out we would LOVE for your feedback on balancing, features, any issues you might face, or any ideas that you have that could make the game better!
